description:
Yugi’s classmate Bakura, possessed by his Millennium Ring’s dark powers, traps Yugi and friends in a Shadow Game where they become the cards themselves!  Not only must Yugi battle to avoid becoming a permanent part of the card game, but also free Bakura’s soul from the Millennium Ring’s control!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Metamorph Pot no Wana! Honoo no Kenshi Ayaushi
Morphing Jar`s Trap! Flame Swordsman in Danger
メタモルポッドの罠! 炎の剣士危うし
